articles.author: Matt Addison
articles.title: Mohamed Salah sends blunt 17-word message after Arsenal as simple Liverpool promise made - Liverpool.com
articles.description: Liverpool forward Mohamed Salah has sent a message to Reds fans over Christmas. The Egyptian wants even more from his Anfield teammates in the next few weeks.
articles.content: Liverpool, currently in second place in the Premier League table, a point behind leaders Arsenal, were held to a draw at Anfield on Christmas Day. Mohamed Salah, however, showed his elite mentality b… [+3950 chars]

articles.author: atri25
articles.title: ‘I am genuinely sorry’ – Tom Curran apologises after BBL ban upheld following appeal - Wisden
articles.description: Tom Curran has apologised as his four-match BBL ban has been upheld by Cricket Australia despite Sydney Sixers' appeal against the sanction.
articles.content:
Tom Curran has apologised after his four-match BBL 2023/24 ban for intimidating an umpire was upheld by Cricket Australia following an unsuccessful appeal by Sydney Sixers against the sanction.
